description:
Several of the world’s largest ad and PR holding companies, including WPP, Omnicom, and  IPG, have had a combined 1,010 contracts with fossil fuel companies in 2023 and 2024, according to the latest data released by the campaign group Clean Creatives. The report comes amid growing pressure for agencies to sever their connections with fossil […]

title: Advertising Industry Has Over a Thousand Contracts With Polluting Industries: Report
